channel.title: Yukang Cao on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Yukang Cao on The AI Talks

item.title: 3D Human Modelling from Image and Text Guidance
item.description: Speaker Yukang Cao is a final-year Ph.D. student at The University of Hong Kong with HKU-PS scholarship. He is under the supervision of Dr. Kenneth Wong and works closely with Dr. Kai Han. Throughout his academic journey, he has gained valuable experiences at UT-Austin, PKU, THU, and Tencent. His research interests lie in 3D modelling of the virtual world, with a particular focus on 3D human reconstruction and the generation of 3D avatars.
